reviewText: I bought this as a surprise for the wife before taking her to Verona.  I expected that it would show some of the sights of the city and perhaps give a bit of its history.  My bad for not checking it further.  Its a concert from musicians in Verona.  Musically, its OK, -- not grand but not too bad.  I wish I'd have had a better understanding of what I was getting but on the plus side, it is good enough that I still have it on the shelf as I think I'll likely listen to it again.
